Arduino blinking light | Kabads - musings, mutterings and murmerings

Arduino blinking light

My first arduino project.

Basically, when you turn the potentiometer one way, the led blinks slower, and when you turn it the other way, it blinks faster.

[AFG_gallery id='8']

It needs a video to explain.
